text: Freya Pausewang (20 August 1932 – 6 July 2020) was a German author and sociology educator. She was a younger sister of Gudrun Pausewang. She was born in Mladkov, Czech Republic. Pausewang was known for her works in Ziele suchen (1994), Dem Spielen Raum geben (1997), Ins Leben begleiten (2009), Macht mich stark für meine Zukunft! (2012), Zukunftsorientierte Pädagogik (2016), Sozialkompetenz. Themenkarten für Teamarbeit, Elternarbeit, Seminare (2017) and Pädagogik auf dem Weg in die Zukunft (2018). Pausewang died on 6 July 2020 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German writers Category:German sociologists Category:German educators
title: Freya Pausewang
